thread.title: Fruit bat's locating clicks echo sophisticated radar

title: Fruit bat's locating clicks echo sophisticated radar
text:
Fruit bat's locating clicks echo sophisticated radar Sunday, April 22, 2018 - 01:30 
Researchers at universities in the United States have discovered a sophisticated form of echolocation in bats, one that is remarkably similar to human-made location systems. Jim Drury reports.   
Researchers at universities in the United States have discovered a sophisticated form of echolocation in bats, one that is remarkably similar to human-made location systems. Jim Drury reports.  //reut.rs/2HTcMfh
